#include<iostream>
#include<stdio.h>
typedef long long ll;
using namespace std;
#define MOD 1000000007
#define gc getchar_unlocked
void scanint(int &x)
{
	register int c=gc();
	x=0;
	for(;(c<48 || c>57);c=gc());
	for(;c>47 && c<58;c=gc()){x=(x<<1)+(x<<3)+c-48;}
}
main()
{
	int t;
	ll n,i,sum;
	ll k=0;
	scanint(t);
	while(t--)
	{	sum=0;
		k=0; 
		scanf("%lld",&n);
		for(i=1;i<=(n/2);i++)
		{	
			k++;
			sum+=((n/i)*i);
			sum%=MOD;
		}
	//	cout<<sum<<"\n";
	//	cout<<k<<"\n";
		sum+=((n*(n+1))/2)-((k*(k+1))/2);
		printf("%lld\n",sum%MOD);
	}
}
